name: ScaleFadeAnimation
desc: The animation in which a component scales up and fades into view.

items.name: type
items.desc: This animation always has the type scale_fade.

items.name: initialAlpha
items.desc: The initial transparency of the component (and the animation). Set initialAlpha to a value between 0 (completely transparent) and 1 (completely visible).

items.name: initialScale
items.desc: The initial scale of the component (and the animation). Set initialScale to a value between 0 (completely scaled down) and 1 (the componentâ€™s original size).

items.name: userControllable
items.desc: Indicates whether the animation is controlled by (is in response to) user action (true) or happens automatically (false).
